items.name: The Jinxed Juju
implicitMods: Grants Level 21 Purity of Elements Skill
explicitMods: 14% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
10% of Damage from Hits is taken from your Spectres' Life before you
flavourText: Burned rhoa's eye and goatman's beard do demand:
Leave behind those lazy bones;
Dance, ye dead, at my command!

items.name: Progenesis
explicitMods: When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

items.typeLine: Abundant Quartz Flask of the Armadillo
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Severed in Sleep
explicitMods: Minions have 60% chance to inflict Withered on Hit

flavourText: His lucky thralls dream eternal,
but we must crawl on our own.
<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Chayula}

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that affect you and allies, increasing the aura's effect on allies, but preventing it from affecting you at all. Cannot support curse auras, or other auras that only affect enemies. Cannot support skills used by totems.
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Supported Aura Skill Gems
Supported Skills have 40% increased Aura Area of Effect
Supported Auras do not affect you
Non-Curse Auras from Supported Skills have 44% increased Effect
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal arcing lightning damage to attackers when you block them.
explicitMods: Buff grants +25% Chance to Block Spell Damage while holding a Shield
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.
